text:
Good work. Looks like you're working hard.
How's it going?

Ah~...
Well, it's kinda... not quite there~

No matter how many times I practice
the bridge part, it just doesn't click.

But it doesn't seem like I can find a solution...
It's like I'm groping in the dark?

Hmm...
Did the trainer say anything about it?

They said, "You're getting tense because you're trying
too hard, so repeat it until your body remembers."

I see, until your body remembers...
Sounds pretty challenging...

Well, it's like,
"Guess I've got no choice but to do it!"

Yeah, that's the spirit!
But don't push yourself too hard, okay?

Producer-san, you're the one who's
creating the environment for me.

If I don't work hard here,
it'd be a lie!
